dublin_core.dcvalue: The mHero platform allows health workers, government authorities, and other key stakeholders to engage in real-time, targeted communication via mobile phone two-way SMS (text messages), interactive voice response, and direct calls in order to rapidly respond to health workers' needs, particularly in emergency situations like the recent Ebola outbreak in West Africa.
Public sector health system (national, regional, district), CHW, Facility-based provider, Facility, Government agency
Dykki Settle, Informatics Director, IntraHealth International, Email: dsettle@intrahealth.org; Stuart Campo, Innovation Deployment Specialist, UNICEF, Email: scampo@unicef.org

Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Human resource management, Provider work planning and scheduling, Provider training and education, Supply chain management, Infectious diseases, Ebola
